reviewText: Mr. Moore is a great ambassador for the New Orleans style of drumming. This release together with his others are a great releases and i think Mr. Moore have done an awesome job getting the old school groove and soul out to the modern drum community !

Stanton Moore as a way of presenting material that is clear and concise. The examples he shows are solid and clearly demonstrate the concepts he is teaching. There is a lot of material here, however and the possibilities will take a long time to explore thoroughly. Overall a really great video.
I wish I had stumbled upon this one long ago.  It is very informative and super entertaining as well.  I could watch it again and again.  I got mine at an incredible price as well.
